blue.0: Before, the world was colorful... When did I stop noticing the colors?
blue.1: When did I stop perceiving colors?

orange.0: Nature was very cruel to someone who hadn't yet learned to walk alone.
orange.2: One more, another one! I want to color everything again!
orange.3: I can feel the vibration of colors!

nocolor.0: Everything seems unfair in the end. But I need to keep following my instincts.
nocolor.1: Seeing so many colors makes me much more excited!
nocolor.2: The world can become colorful again.
nocolor.3: To color, you just need to feel it.
